column1: Use the Groups page to work on fitness goals with other people. On the groups dashboard you will see announcements from the groups your in as well as a list of your groups.
You can go to a group page by highlighting a group and clicking Open Selected Group Page.
You can leave a group by highlight a group and clicking Leave Selected Group.
You can join a new group by entering in a group code and clicking Join Group With Code.

column2: You can create a group by clicking the Create Your Own Group button, after doing so you will be prompted for a Group Name, Description and image selection.

column1: After filling in the information requested, clicking Create Group will make a new group.

column2: On a groupâ€™s Hub page you can see announcements, favourite the group, see a list of members and join the group goal.
At the top of the screen there are three tabs. The last two tabs are Group Goal and Manage Group which are only accessible to the owner of the group.

column1: Under the Group Goal tab the owner can set a goal for all members of the group to opt in to.

column2: Under the Manage Group Tab the owner is able to make an announcement by typing in an announcement and clicking Send.

column1: The owner can invite users by typing in a username and clicking Invite User.
The owner can kick users by highlight a user and clicking Kick Selected user.
